description: Custom metrics will be ingested to Grail regardless of [Classic limits](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/dynatrace-api/environment-api/metric-v2/best-practices#avoid-high-cardinality-limits).

allowAll.description: When enabled every custom metric will be ingested to Grail. Warning: this setting can cause [unexpected billing!](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/dynatrace-api/environment-api/metric-v2/best-practices#avoid-high-cardinality-limits)
